Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PtALF4 (Portunus trituberculatus anti-lipopolysaccharide factor isoform 4; crabs, Arthropods, ani
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Contains a signal peptide and an LPS-binding Domain (CTLSRSPYIKSLELHYRAEVTC) and two conserved cysteine residues which can form a disulfide bridge.

Literature.Title: Multiple isoforms of immune-related genes from hemocytes and eyestalk cDNA libraries of swimming crab Portunus trituberculatus.
Literature.Author: Liu Y, Cui Z, Song C, Wang S, Li Q.

Literature.Title: A new anti-lipopolysaccharide factor isoform (PtALF4) from the swimming crab Portunus trituberculatus exhibited structural and functional diversity of ALFs.
Literature.Author: Liu Y, Cui Z, Li X, Song C, Li Q, Wang S.
